overview: Kampung Bendang Kweng and Pantai Cherang Nipah under the care of a newly appointed Penggawa (officer). On the night of the inauguration of the officer's appointment, a fight broke out between the boys of Bendang Kweng village and Pantai Cherang Nipah. In oder to create unity among these boys the Penggawa decide to hold a 7 -a -side beach soccer match to grab a trophy of a goat.
title: Sebuah Piala Seekor Kambing
